name: Connect 2
description:
Connect 2 is a simple prototype for what could be a massive puzzle game. This DEMO provides 3 interesting levels for you to play. In order to complete each level you must guide both players through the map so they can connect. PLEASE NOTE THAT THIS IS A PROTOTYPE: YOU MAY ENCOUNTER SOME BUGS OR ISSUES WITH THE GAME

Aim of the game:

  • COLLECT COINS to unlock doors and lift up platforms for the other player
  • CONNECT the 2 players by moving into each other

Controls:

WASD: PLAYER 1

ARROWS: PLAYER 2

If you would like to see more of this game please let me know and ill add the following:

  • MORE LEVELS
  • Push-able Blocks
  • Pressure Pads
  • Rotating Blocks
  • Teleporters
  • LASERS 
  • AND MORE...

Note: The 3rd level includes raising lava. The lava DOES go back down
